title: Mountain sanctuary
brief_description: In Western Tasmania, rugged mountain peaks and secret Alpine lakes beckon the bush walker and mountaineer. Explores thoroughly the beautiful Tasmanian highlands where unique flora and fauna, including Tasmanian devils, wombats, native cats, and black swans are found.
